#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
using namespace std;

vector<int> graph[10001];
int visited[10001]={0};
int ad_cnt[10001]={0};
int parent[10001]={0};
stack<int> st;

int main()
{
	int n,m;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
	int i,j,a,b;
	for(i=0;i<m;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
		ad_cnt[a]++;
		graph[a].push_back(b);
		ad_cnt[b]++;
		graph[b].push_back(a);
	}
	
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(ad_cnt[i]!=0)
		break;
	}
	
	int start=i;
	int flag=1;          
	st.push(start);
	while(!st.empty())
	{
	  int item=st.top();
	  st.pop();
	  visited[item]=1;
	  for(j=0;j<graph[item].size();j++)
	  {
	  	if(!visited[graph[item][j]])
	  	{
	  		st.push(graph[item][j]);
	  		parent[graph[item][j]]=item;
	  	}
	  	else
	  	if(visited[graph[item][j]]==1 && graph[item][j]!=parent[item])
	  	{
	  		flag=0;
	  		break;
	  	}
	  }	
	}
	
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	if(visited[i]==0)
	{
		flag=0;
		break;
	}
	
	if(flag)
	printf("YES\n");
	else
	printf("NO\n");
	
	return 0;
}
